dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think flying to Russia's just a quick hop, but actually there are some major new procedures starting soon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think flying to Russia's just a quick hop, but actually there are some major new procedures starting soon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, starting June 30th, 2025, right? That's when these new rules kick in for foreign nationals, including Kazakh citizens.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, starting June thirtieth, twenty twenty five, right? That's when these new rules kick in for foreign nationals, including Kazakh citizens.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting June 30, 2025, new border-crossing rules will take effect in Russia for foreign nationals, including citizens of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And VietJet Qazaqstan is already warning passengers about potential delays during check-in and border control.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And VietJet Qazaqstan is already warning passengers about potential delays during check-in and border control.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: VietJet Qazaqstan (formerly Qazaq Air) has warned passengers of possible delays during check-in and border control procedures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow. So what's the big change here? Is it like, a new requirement or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow. So what's the big change here? Is it like, a new requirement or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's biometric identification—fingerprinting and facial photography at all Russian border checkpoints now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's biometric identification-fingerprinting and facial photography at all Russian border checkpoints now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the airline, mandatory biometric identification (fingerprinting and facial photography) will be required for entry into Russia at all border checkpoints.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Even for visa-free travel? I thought Kazakhstan and Russia had that agreement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even for visa-free travel? I thought Kazakhstan and Russia had that agreement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They do, but now you have to pre-register in this system called ESIA, which is the Russian public services portal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They do, but now you have to pre-register in this system called E S I A, which is the Russian public services portal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Even if there is a visa-free regime between countries, foreign nationals must now pre-register in the ESIA (Russian public services portal) system and submit an entry request through a special mobile app," the statement noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So you need to use a mobile app to submit an entry request before you even get to the airport?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So you need to use a mobile app to submit an entry request before you even get to the airport?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Even if there is a visa-free regime between countries, foreign nationals must now pre-register in the ESIA (Russian public services portal) system and submit an entry request through a special mobile app," the statement noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. And it's part of Phase II of Russia's border control pilot program, based on a government decree from November 7th last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. And it's part of Phase I I of Russia's border control pilot program, based on a government decree from November seventh last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These changes are part of Phase II of Russia's border entry-exit control pilot program, based on a government decree from November 7, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That sounds like it could really slow things down, especially at first.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sounds like it could really slow things down, especially at first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These changes aim to enhance security and automate data checks, but during the initial phase, they may cause longer wait times and airport delays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. The airline is strongly advising people to arrive extra early to avoid missing flights or getting stressed out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. The airline is strongly advising people to arrive extra early to avoid missing flights or getting stressed out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We strongly advise our passengers to allow extra time for all procedures. This will help avoid unnecessary stress and missed flights, said VietJet Qazaqstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, it makes sense from a security standpoint—automating data checks and all that—but the initial phase is gonna be messy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, it makes sense from a security standpoint-automating data checks and all that-but the initial phase is gonna be messy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These changes aim to enhance security and automate data checks, but during the initial phase, they may cause longer wait times and airport delays.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. For frequent travelers between Kazakhstan and Russia, advance prep is gonna be crucial.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. For frequent travelers between Kazakhstan and Russia, advance prep is gonna be crucial.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For Kazakh citizens who frequently travel to Russia, advance preparation is crucial to avoid disruption.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Where can people find more info about this? Like, the official instructions?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Where can people find more info about this? Like, the official instructions?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They should check Russia's public services website or the mobile app for the most up-to-date details and forms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They should check Russia's public services website or the mobile app for the most up-to-date details and forms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Up-to-date information and entry form instructions can be found on Russia's official public services website or its mobile application.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Good to know. Hopefully people hear about this well before June 2025 rolls around.
